include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

include_directories(${Boost_INCLUDE_DIR})
link_directories(${Boost_LIBRARY_DIRS})

list(APPEND mthpower_sources
    m_th_power_fc_cc_impl.cc
    m_th_power_v1_cc_impl.cc
)

set(mthpower_sources "${mthpower_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT mthpower_sources)
	MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
	return()
endif(NOT mthpower_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-mthpower SHARED ${mthpower_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-mthpower ${Boost_LIBRARIES} ${GNURADIO_ALL_LIBRARIES})
set_target_properties(gnuradio-mthpower PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_mthpower_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-mthpower PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-mthpower RUNTIME_COMPONENT "mthpower_runtime" DEVEL_COMPONENT "mthpower_devel")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

include_directories(${CPPUNIT_INCLUDE_DIRS})

list(APPEND test_mthpower_sources
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/test_mthpower.cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_mthpower.cc
)

add_executable(test-mthpower ${test_mthpower_sources})

target_link_libraries(
  test-mthpower
  ${GNURADIO_RUNTIME_LIBRARIES}
  ${Boost_LIBRARIES}
  ${CPPUNIT_LIBRARIES}
  gnuradio-mthpower
)

GR_ADD_TEST(test_mthpower test-mthpower)
